INTERSHOP IOM 4.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision f8f820589b8291dd67701f73927d5fcd1d1d5c03)

Table oms.Shop2TaxTypeDefDO

Tax types as used by the shop in the order service.
A mapping between the shop and tax type is only required for shop tax names that differ from TaxTypeDefDO.taxType

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
shopTaxTypeName varchar(512) The name of the tax type that should be used by the shop. Example FULL-TAX 
TaxTypeDefDO taxTypeDefRef integer The tax type of the shop. 
ShopDO shopRef bigint The shop the tax type should be used for. 
modificationDate timestamp without time zone  

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY Shop2TaxTypeDefDO_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) 
UNIQUE CONSTRAINT Shop2TaxTypeDefDO_taxTypeDefRef_key UNIQUE ("taxTypeDefRef", "shopRef") 
FOREIGN KEY fkc92f1dd93f1ed6 FOREIGN KEY ("shopRef") REFERENCES "ShopDO"(id) 
FOREIGN KEY taxTypeDefRefShop2TaxTypeDefDO FOREIGN KEY ("taxTypeDefRef") REFERENCES "TaxTypeDefDO"(id) 
INDEX index_Shop2TaxTypeDefDO_modificationDate CREATE INDEX "index_Shop2TaxTypeDefDO_modificationDate" ON "Shop2TaxTypeDefDO" USING btree ("modificationDate") 
INDEX index_Shop2TaxTypeDefDO_shopRef CREATE INDEX "index_Shop2TaxTypeDefDO_shopRef" ON "Shop2TaxTypeDefDO" USING btree ("shopRef") 
INDEX index_Shop2TaxTypeDefDO_taxTypeDefRef CREATE INDEX "index_Shop2TaxTypeDefDO_taxTypeDefRef" ON "Shop2TaxTypeDefDO" USING btree ("taxTypeDefRef")
